item.title: Introduction to VLSI Design Flow: RTL to GDSII
item.description: Wonder why AI, modern smartphones, and countless digital devices have become so powerful yet compact? The secret lies in the ability to pack billions of transistors into tiny silicon chips â€” a feat accomplished through Very Large-Scale Integration (VLSI). At the core of this accomplishment is a complex, multi-step design flow that transforms abstract hardware concepts into a physical chip ready for fabrication.
